info.title: Channel Catalogs
info.description: This api allows you to manage your channel catalogs. A channel catalog is an association between your store and a channel.

tags.name: Rules
tags.description: All rules operations. Rules are automatic optimisations based on report filters.

get.summary: List all your current channel catalogs

schema.description: The key will be the channel catalog identifier, the value is the link to the operationId: GetChannelCatalog

201.description: When the channel has been successfully added for this store

Retry-After.description: The duration in second to wait before polling this resource

schema.description: Link to the new channel catalog

402.description: You have to upgrade your offer to activate this channel catalog

get.summary: Get channel catalog exclusion filter operators

200.description: Channel catalog exclusion filter operator list

204.description: Channel catalog exclusion filter list configured

delete.summary: Delete a specific channel catalog product value override

204.description: Channel catalog product value override deleted

post.description:
By default a all your catalog products are exposed to the channel.
You can disable a product by using this operation.
/!\ In case of massive optimisation we recommand you to use the analytics api

By default a all your catalog products are exposed to the channel.
You can reenable a product by using this operation.
/!\ In case of massive optimisation we recommand you to use the analytics api

get.summary: Display the synchronization status of the clicks and orders
get.description:
Your clicks and orders are eventually consistent. \
This operation indicates you at which date the projections are.

get.summary: Get report filter list for the given store

401.description: This report filter is used by rule. In the error message you will find the rule identifier.
This report filter is used by rule. In the error message you will find the rule identifier.

200.description: Your reporting by day exported into a file

Location.description:
To indicate the url of the export file
Example: https://beezupchannel.blob.core.windows.net/reports/exports/Excel_Report_Days.xslx

To indicate the url of the export file
Example: https://beezupchannel.blob.core.windows.net/reports/exports/Excel_Report_Channels.xslx

To indicate the url of the export file
Example: https://beezupchannel.blob.core.windows.net/reports/exports/Excel_Report_Categories.xslx

To indicate the url of the export file
Example: https://beezupchannel.blob.core.windows.net/reports/exports/Excel_Report_Products.xslx

post.description:
/!\ WARNING /!\ \
Apply the operation on every product related to this request. \
This operation is used at the bottom of the analytics page result.

/!\ WARNING /!\ \
This operation will reenable or disable this product for every channel indicated in the body.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The product identifier concerned by this optimisation

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The channel identifier list concerned by this optimisation

post.description:
/!\ WARNING /!\ \
This operation will reenable or disable products's category for every channel indicated in the body.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The category identifier concerned by this optimisation

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The channel identifier list concerned by this optimisation

post.description:
/!\ WARNING /!\ \
Apply the operation on every product on this channel.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The channel identifier concerned by this optimisation

get.description:
Your clicks and orders are eventually consistent. \
This operation indicates you at which date the projections are for this store.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The click's count you want to get

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The order's count you want to get

get.summary: Get the latest external orders tracked

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The external order's count you want to get

get.summary: Gets the list of rules for a given store

400.description: Period on filter cannot be custom or filter does not exist

401.description: Store not allowed to use rules. Please upgrade your offer or contact us.

403.description: Reached the maximum amount of rules allowed for your offer. Please upgrade your offer or contact us.

post.summary: Run all rules for this store

401.description: Store not allowed to use rules. Please upgrade your offer or contact us.

409.description: Rules for this store are currently running. Please try again later.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The count of rule history to retrieve

409.description: Rules for this store are currently running. Please try again later.

400.description: Filter does not exist or period on filter cannot be custom

401.description: Store not allowed to use rules. Please upgrade your offer or contact us.

409.description: Rules for this store are currently running. Please try again later.

400.description: Rule is not enabled. Please enable this run before trying to run it.

400.description: Priority can only be changed when more than one rule is defined

generalSettings.description: Represents the general settings of your channel catalog

acceptToPublishInfo.description: If true then you authorize disclosure of my statistics generated from clicks and sales

noCategoryMapping.description: Indicates that the channel authorize you to do not map your categories with their categories

doNotExportOutOfStockProducts.description: Do not export "out of stock" products. Note: this option is not taken into account by the counter.

activeBeezUPTracking.description: Activate BeezUP tracking for my statistics (checked by default)

costType.description:
CPC means cost per click.
CPA means cost per action.
You can have CPC/CPA with a global cost value.
You can have CPC/CPA by category the cost value MUST be null
You can have global fixed price.

costSettings.description: Depending to the cost type you will have to define a cost value.

globalCostValue.description: In case of global cost type, you have to indicate the cost value.

unmapCategoryRequest.description: The request message to unmap a catalog category path to a channel category path

mapCategoryRequest.description: The request message to make a mapping between catalog category path and a channel category path

overrideSubCategoryMappings.description: Great feature! In case of mapping to parent channel category, you can ask to override the mapping of all sub channel category to this catalog category path

autoMapNewSubCategories.description: Great feature! In case of mapping to parent catalog category, you can ask to automatically map new sub catalog category in the next importation to this channel category path.

channelCatalogCategoryMapping.description:
Represent a mapping between a catalog category path and a channel category path. 
The cost on this mapping can be applied.

costValue.description: In case of CPC_ByCategory or CPA_ByCategory cost type, you have to indicate the cost value.

catalogColumnId.description: The catalog column identifier (catalog or custom column)

columnMapping.description: Represent a mapping between a channel column considering channel category mapping and a catalog column

upgradeOfferRequired.description: The message contains the offer identifier required to execute this operation

columnMappings.description: The column mapping list between a channel and a catalog

enabled.description: Indicates if the channel catalog is active

isMarketplace.description: Indicates if this channel catalog is related to a marketplace

links.description: Indicates the actions you can do on a channel catalog

productOverrides.description: The key is the channel column identifier

position.description: The position of the exclusion filter

groupId.description: Indicate the filter's group. All filters in the same group means an "AND" operation in the filter group

positionInGroup.description: Indicate the filter group position. This information is used for the UI purpose and must be unique in the filter group.

value.description: The value indicate by the user when the filter operation requires it.

disabled.description: Indicates if the product has been disabled or not

categoryMapped.description: Indicates if the product's category has been mapped to a channel category

excluded.description: Indicates if the product has been excluded by a exclusion filter

channelCatalogProductInfoLinks.description: Indicates the differents actions you can do on a channel product

productStateFilter.description: You can filter on the product state.

reportProductFilter.description: Describe a filter on a product's column

columnId.description: The column identifier of your catalog or a custom column.

values.description: Must be null if the operator is "IsNull" or "IsNotNull". Can contains multiple value in case of "InList" operator. Otherwise a single value is expected.

reportProductFilterOperatorName.description: Indicate the operator you want to make on the columnId

beginPeriodUtcDate.description: The begin date period you want to get the report

endPeriodUtcDate.description: The end date period you want to get the report.

reportIndicatorFilterOperatorName.description: Indicates the operator you want to apply on this indicator

value.description: Indicates the filter value to apply on this indicator

categoryPath.description: Indicates on which category path you want to make the filter

performanceIndicatorType.description: Indicate on which indicator or value you want to make your formula

beginPeriodUtcDate.description: The begin date period you want to get the report

endPeriodUtcDate.description: The end date period you want to get the report.

globalMarginPercent.description: If the margin type is 'Global', indicate the percentage of sale price.

linkClickToOrderMaxDay.description: If the linkOrderType is OnClickDate, indicate the max day to search the click from the order

onlyPaymentValidatedOrders.description: If true, you will get the only the orders with payment validated. Otherwise, you will get all orders validated or not.

onlyDirectSales.description: If true, you will get only direct sales. Otherwise the indirect sales will be included.

globalPerformanceIndicator.description: Indicates the global performance indicator for this channel

enabledOnChannelCount.description: The count of channel where this product is enabled

channelCount.description: The channel count where this product can be enabled

clickCount.description: The click count for this product

orderCount.description: The order count for this product

performanceIndicator.description: The performance indicator based on the performance indicator formula indicated in the request for this product

links.description: The action list on this product

enabledProductCount.description: The enabled product count for this category

catalogProductCount.description: The catalog product count related to this category

clickCount.description: The click count for this category

orderCount.description: The order count for this category

performanceIndicator.description: The performance indicator based on the performance indicator formula indicated in the request for this category

links.description: The action list on this catagory

enabledProductCount.description: The enabled product count for this channel

catalogProductCount.description: The catalog product count for this channel

clickCount.description: The click count for this channel

orderCount.description: The order count for this channel

performanceIndicator.description: The performance indicator based on the performance indicator formula indicated in the request for this channel

links.description: The action list on this channel

clickCount.description: The click count for this channel

orderCount.description: The order count for this channel

performanceIndicator.description: The performance indicator based on the performance indicator formula indicated in the request for this channel

clickCount.description: The click count for this channel

orderCount.description: The order count for this channel

performanceIndicator.description: The performance indicator based on the performance indicator formula indicated in the request for this channel

thirdParameter.description: Indicate the value of the third parameter of your formula

performanceIndicatorFormulaParameterType.description: Indicate on which indicator or value you want to make your formula

productActive.description: Indicates if the product still exists in your catalog

utcDate.description: The utc date of the click

ipAddress.description: The user's IP address related to this click

utcDate.description: The utc date of the order.

totalAmount.description: The total amount related to the order.

paymentValidated.description: Indicate if the payment of this order has been validated or not.

products.description: the product list related to this order.

unitPrice.description: The product's unit price related to this order

margin.description: Indicate the product's margin related to this order.

utcDate.description: The utc date of the external order.

visitorId.description: Can be null. The visitor identifier related to this external order

totalAmount.description: The total amount related to the external order.

paymentValidated.description: Indicate if the payment of this external order has been validated or not.

products.description: Can be null. the product list related to this external order.

productSku.description: The product sku received related to the external order.

productTitle.description: We tried to get the catalog product title based on the product SKU. This property can be null, if we cannot found the product. This is possible if the product is not referenced in the imported catalog.

productImageUrl.description: We tried to get the catalog product image Url based on the product SKU. This property can be null, if we cannot found the product. This is possible if the product is not referenced in the imported catalog.

productActive.description: We tried to get the catalog product if it's still active based on the product SKU. This property can be null, if we cannot found the product. This is possible if the product is not referenced in the imported catalog.

productId.description: We tried to get the catalog product identifier based on the product SKU. This property can be null, if we cannot found the product. This is possible if the product is not referenced in the imported catalog.

unitPrice.description: The product's unit price related to this external order. This property is voluntarily a string because the value could be an invalid one.

quantity.description: Indicate the product's quantity ordered. This property is voluntarily a string because the value could be an invalid one

margin.description: Indicate the product's margin related to this order. This property is voluntarily a string because the value could be an invalid one

clickSynchronizationUtcDate.description: The utc date of the latest click synchronized

orderSynchonizationUtcDate.description: The utc date of the latest order synchronized

marketplaceOrderSynchonizationUtcDate.description: The utc date of the latest marketplace order synchronized

clickSynchronizationUtcDate.description: The utc date of the latest click synchronized

orderSynchonizationUtcDate.description: The utc date of the latest order synchronized

marketplaceOrderSynchonizationUtcDate.description: The utc date of the latest marketplace order synchronized

links.description: The list of action you can do on the filter subject
Indicates the actions you can do on this report filter
Links to know if the user can create a rule or run all rules

ruleLastExecutionStatus.description: The status of the last execution

lastExecutionUtcDate.description: The utc date of the last execution

reportFilterId.description: Report filter identifier linked to the rule

links.description: Links to retrieve/action on other entities

reportFilterId.description: The report filter to use for the rule

startUtcDate.description: The start validity utc date of the rule

endUtcDate.description: The end validity utc date of the rule

updateRuleRequest.description: This update will replace the following values.

startUtcDate.description: Not required. The start validity utc date of the rule.

endUtcDate.description: Not required. The end validity utc date of the rule

ruleExecutionReportingStatus.description: The status of the execution of the rule

ruleExecutionReportingErrorType.description: The error type for this execution if any

ruleExecutionReportingExecutionSource.description: The requestor type for the execution of the rule

startedUtcDate.description: The start utc date of the execution of the rule

completedUtcDate.description: The completed utc date of the execution of the rule

affectedProductCount.description: The count of affected products, active or not

activeAffectedProductCount.description: The count of affected active products

affectedChannelCount.description: The count of affected Channels across all products

userId.description: The userId that executed the rule if any

reportUrl.description: The url for the excel report for this execution

links.description: Links to retrieve/action on this rule execution
